name: You're Manaka's onii-chan♪lovey-dovey with Yandere imouto.(for Win & Mac)
name_original: You're Manaka's onii-chan♪lovey-dovey with Yandere imouto.(for Win & Mac)
description:
Story
An adventure game about making out with a yandere little sister(imouto).
The heroine, Manaka, loves Haruaki-kun, and one day he asks her to go out with him.
One day, he asks her to go out with him. However, Haruaki has a propensity that he can't tell anyone about.
However, Haruaki has a proclivity that he can't tell anyone about, and that is that he likes little sisters(imouto) who look like the characters in slice of life anime.
But actually, Manaka is the same way, and says, "I wanted a kind older onii-chan(big bro) too.
So Manaka proposed that she and Haruaki go out as lovers and siblings.
Haruaki is dreamy at Manaka's unexpected proposal, but then Aika's abnormal obsession with her "onii-chan" begins.
Manaka's obsession with her onii-chan begins.

imouto = little sister
onii-chan = big brother

The live game is welcome!!
We'd love to hear from you!
https://twitter.com/akatsukimeu
It's not required, but we'd love it if you'd give us credit in the summary section of your videos!
Examples of credits
Production: akatsukimeu / meuchannel https://twitter.com/akatsukimeu

Game Tips
The story is basically a straight line. Manaka's reactions change depending on the choices you make.
If you choose the top option, you can enjoy Manaka's funny reactions.
